resources.string: URLs from these domains will always be marked as safe. Use with caution.
Allowlisted domains bypass all security checks. Only add domains you fully trust.
URL contains @ symbol used to hide the real destination.
URL path or parameters suggest credential harvesting activity.
Pattern matches known threat signature #4421 from global threat intelligence.
Domain created less than 24 hours ago. High likelihood of disposable phishing infrastructure.
Domain appears randomly generated, common in phishing.
URL is unusually long, which can be used to hide the actual destination.
URL uses a non-standard port number.
URL uses redirect chains that may hide the true destination.
URL points to a potentially dangerous file type.
URL uses a dangerous scheme that can execute code.
URL has an unusual number of subdomains, which can be used to mislead users.
Domain uses a top-level domain commonly associated with malicious sites.
The .%1$s TLD is commonly used for malicious sites.

QR Shield home screen. Tap Start Scanning to begin, or choose from gallery.
Warning, URL appears to be malicious phishing attempt
Main navigation bar with 4 tabs: Home, Scan, History, and Settings
Scan QR code from photo gallery
Scan result showing verdict and risk score
Scan result: %1$s, verdict %2$s, score %3$d. Tap to view details.
Scan result: %1$s, risk score %2$d out of 100. URL: %3$s. %4$d risk factors found.
Start scanning for QR codes using camera

Domain structure analyzed for phishing patterns.
Works perfectly in isolated networks. Designed for enterprise security.
Mehr Guard operates entirely on your device. No cloud. No servers. No data collection. Complete privacy by design.
Threat signatures stored encrypted on-device. Updated via secure offline imports.
Scan history can be wiped instantly. We collect zero telemetry or analytics.
ML models run locally using optimized inference. Zero cloud dependencies.
Camera captures and decodes QR locally
Verdict shown, data stays on device
Red Team Mode bypasses camera and injects test URLs directly into the detection engine.
Do not enter credentials on this page
Block the domain in your enterprise firewall
If credentials were entered, reset passwords immediately
Learn how to report suspicious QRs.
This URL exhibits patterns consistent with known malicious campaigns targeting enterprise credentials.
Checks for known patterns and homoglyphs without aggressive heuristics. Ideal for daily use.
Minimal checks. Prioritizes speed and fewer interruptions. Use only for trusted environments.
Aggressive heuristics and strict sandboxing. Expect frequent warnings for unknown domains.
Database integrity verified via cryptographic checksum. Signed by Mehr Guard Security Ops.
Database integrity verified & up to date.
Complete all modules to earn certificate
Reveal hidden destinations (Online Only). Requires network access.
Quickly scan QR codes for phishing threats
Camera scanning mode. Point camera at a QR code.
URL path contains keywords commonly used in phishing.
Camera access is needed to scan QR codes
Error occurred: %s. Tap Try Again to retry.
Camera permission denied. Please enable in settings.
Camera preview for QR code scanning. Position a QR code in the center of the screen to scan it.
